trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> is a public implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> base class for the purpose of rendering <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> é uma implementação pública do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> classe para fins de renderização base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: It adds the capability of carrying zone information from the associated control into design view, but does not otherwise change the functionality of the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Ele adiciona a capacidade de carregar informações de zona do controle associado ao modo de design, mas tem alterações não precisam ter a funcionalidade do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: As with other control designers, you can change the design-time rendering of custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls by inheriting from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> and overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como com outros designers de controle, você pode alterar o processamento de tempo de design de personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controles herdando de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> e substituindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you want to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> method, be sure to include the base implementation so as to retain zone information.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner.CreateViewControl%2A> método, certifique-se de incluir a implementação base para reter informações de zona.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a simple custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control that allows the user to change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> property of the target control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um simple personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controle que permite que o usuário altere a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ToolTip%2A> propriedade do controle de destino.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> validates the control and replaces the user input text box at design time with a label explaining that it is hidden.
trans-unit.target: O associado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner> valida o controle e substitui a caixa de texto de entrada do usuário em tempo de design com um rótulo explicando que ele está oculto.

trans-unit.source: In order for the custom control to render, the page must have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> for the control to reside in, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> containing a control for the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> to act on, as shown in the following code example.
trans-unit.target: Para o controle personalizado processar, a página deve ter uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle, um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> com um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone.ZoneTemplate%2A> para o controle deve residir no e um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> que contém um controle para personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> para agir em, conforme mostrado a seguir exemplo de código.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> to be usable at run time, edit mode must be enabled on the page.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> ser usado em tempo de execução, o modo de edição deve ser habilitado na página.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to do so with a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como fazer isso com um arquivo code-behind.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control to render at design time.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> associado a ser renderizado no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
This method is overridden to copy zone information to the view control.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é substituído para copiar informações de zona para o controle de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the control resides in a zone of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />, and then gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o controle reside em uma zona do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" /> e, em seguida, obtém a marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The markup that is used to represent the control at design time, or error markup if the control does not reside in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />.
trans-unit.target: A marcação que é usada para representar o controle em tempo de design ou marcação de erro, se o controle não residir em um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control associated with the designer.
Binds the designer to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Associa o designer ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart" /> associado.
